org.spongepowered.api.event.item.inventory

Interface ClickInventoryEvent.Shift

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AffectItemStackEvent, AffectSlotEvent, Cancellable, ChangeInventoryEvent, ClickInventoryEvent, Event, InteractInventoryEvent, TargetContainerEvent, TargetInventoryEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClickInventoryEvent.Shift.Primary, ClickInventoryEvent.Shift.Secondary
    Enclosing interface:
    ClickInventoryEvent

    public static interface ClickInventoryEvent.Shift
extends ClickInventoryEvent
    A click with the shift modifier active.

    Usually contains multiple transactions.

    ClickInventoryEvent.getSlot() returns the primary interaction Slot.

    The Shift-Double-Click action fires this event multiple times. In that case the primary interaction Slot is the Slot of the item moved away.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ClickInventoryEvent.Shift.Primary
      A click with the primary mouse button and the shift modifier active
      static interface  ClickInventoryEvent.Shift.Secondary
      A click with the secondary mouse button and the shift modifier active
